metadata.name: Dancing Flame: Chiara x Eralore
metadata.description:
"For I know my deed is done, I can rest I need not run. So with a prayer in my heart, a new day comes, my new life start." - Elena, By Way of the Sea

Chiara Moreni is an Italian illustrator based in London with over 6 years of experience in the animation industry & two years in the NFT space. Her artworks represent the female figure with dynamic painterly strokes & vibrant colours, deeply connected with her emotions, dreams & thoughts. For more, visit https://chiaramoreni.eth.co/creations
